profile.name: hardmaru
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Netflix | Exploring AI and Machine Learning
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning. Proficient in multiple programming languages and frameworks. Experienced in open-source development and research.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Netflix
description: Developed and deployed AI/ML models for various applications, including recommendation systems and content moderation.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features and functionalities.
Conducted research in reinforcement learning, world models, and evolution strategies, publishing papers and contributing to open-source projects.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed AI/ML applications for clients across various industries.
Conducted research in deep learning frameworks, including PyTorch-NEAT and TensorFlow.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and contributed to open-source projects related to AI/ML, including cppn-gan-vae-tensorflow.

experience.title: Researcher
description: Conducted research in reinforcement learning and deep learning frameworks, including Chainer RL and PyTorch-NEAT.
